column5: Hey guys, wanting to hit simcoe this afternon for a few hours to chase some smallies but not sure which part of the lake to fish at this time of the year? I know there in deep water butwhere???lol have a gps with a map of the lake and marked some deep shoals but not sure if its the right type of water....any advice would be apprecitated......Also have an extra spot on my boat if any one wants to come PM me asap
I wish I could join you - good luck out there! -Brian
Hey I might be heading up to Simcoe/Cooks tomorrow. What's your report like? Catch any monster bronzebacks?
